Description.Text: Akteon Holiday Village Facilities and services: 2 outdoor swimming pools, sun terrace, indoor pool, buffet- and a la carte restaurant, pool restaurant and bar, jacuzzi, sauna, massage, fitness room, mini-club, children's playground and entertainment programme. The apartments/studios are equipped with bathroom/shower, kitchenette, telephone, TV, safe, air conditioning and balcony/terrace.
Akteon Holiday Village is located on the sea front of Chloraka Village and only a few minutes drive from the harbour of Paphos and Coral Bay.
